Description.Text:
Position Sea front hotel Hotel Tiffany's welcomes you into a new environment, completely refurbished to make it unique in its style. The Hotel is easy reachable by car and by train.
Restaurant Panoramic Restaurant with air conditioning.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Last restructions works: 2011.
RESTAURANT: Restaurant proposes 4 men√π on choice, mixed buffet, fruit or dessert. Sweet and salty buffet breakfast.
SERVICES: Miniclub for child from 3 years old, opened from 31/05/14 to 07/08/14 from 10:00 am to 02:00pm and from 07:00 pm to 09:00 pm (except saturday & sunday). Pianobar and theme night once a week from 31/05/14 to 07/09/14.
ARRIVAL & DEPARTURE: Check in from 01.00 pm - Check out within 10.00 am
